comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model ZoneAreaLocation adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/ZoneAreaLocation/schema.json
description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Queuing Zone in a Terminal.

contents.name: Name
contents.comment: Unique name for the Zone Area Location.

contents.name: TerminalAreaLocation
contents.comment: The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport Terminal building.
